name: Mathematics
description: Core concepts including Algebra, Geometry, Calculus, and Statistics.

name: Physics
description: Study of matter, energy, space, time, and fundamental forces. Includes Mechanics, Thermodynamics, Electromagnetism, Optics, and Modern Physics.

name: Chemistry
description: Study of substances, their properties, structure, composition, and reactions. Includes General, Organic, and Inorganic Chemistry.

name: Biology
description: Study of living organisms, including their structure, function, growth, origin, evolution, and distribution.

name: History
description: Study of past events, particularly in human affairs. Includes Ancient, Medieval, and Modern History.

name: Geography
description: Study of lands, features, inhabitants, and phenomena of Earth.

name: Computer Science
description: Study of computation, algorithms, data structures, and computer systems.

name: Literature
description: Study of written works, especially those considered of superior or lasting artistic merit.
